titleInfo.title: Binding of [3H] acetylcholine to acetylcholine receptor from torpedo californica under equilibrium condition: stoichiometry and evidence for long-lived metastable states
Molecular basis of nerve activity: proceedings of the Internat. Symposium in Memory of David Nachmansohn (1899 - 1983), Berlin (West), Germany, October 11 - 13, 1984
